thread.title: ATP World Tour 250, USCC Men's Singles Seeds Progress

title: ATP World Tour 250, USCC Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: April 10, 2018 / 1:22 AM / Updated 18 hours ago ATP World Tour 250, USCC Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Apr 10 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour 250, USCC Men's Singles matches on Monday .. Seeds .. Seed Round Rslt Opponent Score 1 John Isner (USA) 2nd to play Henri Laaksonen (SUI) (start 15:00) 1st won (Bye) 2 Sam Querrey (USA) 2nd to play (start 15:00) 1st won (Bye) 3 Jack Sock (USA) 2nd to play (start 15:00) 1st won (Bye) 4 Nick Kyrgios (AUS) 2nd to play (start 15:00) 1st won (Bye) 5 Fernando Verdasco (ESP) 1st lost Denis Kudla (USA) 6-4 7-6 6 Steve Johnson (USA) 1st to play Ernesto Escobedo (USA) (start 23:00) 7 Ryan Harrison (USA) 1st to play Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) (start 21:00) 8 Tennys Sandgren (USA) 2nd to play (start 15:00) 1st won Blaz Kavcic (SLO) 6-2 6-2 (Note : all times are GMT)
